fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
Staff of Homa
Is good in all situations, providing various stats which Hu Tao likes. A CRIT Rate circlet is recommended as both this weapon's substat and Hu Tao's ascension stat are CRIT DMG.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
Deathmatch, Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, Dragon's Bane

Lithic Spear is a very strong option (although not better than Staff of Homa) if you have many Liyue party members; for example, in a team with Hu Tao, Zhongli, Yelan and Xingqiu.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
**2)** Elemental Skill: Guide to Afterlife
**3)** Elemental Burst: Spirit Soother

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Although 4-piece Crimson Witch of Flames is Hu Tao's best set, it is only better than 4-piece Shimenawa's Reminiscence by a very small margin. As Momiji-Dyed Court contains both Shimenawa's Reminiscence and Emblem of Severed Fate (the best set for Hu Tao's dedicated Hydro supports), it is recommended that you farm that domain instead if you're just starting to build Hu Tao.
